long_description: Add a touch of class to your canoe and improve its functionality with the Harmony Cane canoe seat. Lightweight construction does not absorb or pool water. Ash frame is strong yet provides some give to improve seating comfort. Standard design for bow or stern installation on canoes. The Harmony Cane canoe seat can be easily cut to customize to your particular boat.
short_description: Add a touch of class to your canoe and improve its functionality with the Harmony Cane canoe seat.
